name: bury_1_body
description: Buried your first body.

name: bury_10_bodies
description: Buried 10 bodies.

name: bury_50_bodies
description: Buried 50 bodies.

name: first_slice
description: Got your first slice of meat. Smells a little strange, but looks like ordinary meat...

name: first_slice_10
description: Made 30 slices. You've got the perfect size slice pretty much down.

name: church_up_1
description: Upgraded the church.

name: church_up_2
description: Upgraded the church for the second time.

name: fish_1
description: Caught 6 different types of fish. One fish for every day!

name: fish_2
description: Caught 10 different types of fish.

name: fish_3
description: Caught 15 types of fish! You know everything about fish. They feel uncomfortable about it...

name: fish_200
description: Caught 200 fish. Your name is used to terrify misbehaving fish larvae.

name: fish_goldfish
description: Got a gold fish. Want to make a wish?

name: cook_1
description: Cooked 10 different dishes or drinks.

name: cook_2
description: Cooked 20 different dishes or drinks.

name: cook_3
description: Cooked 30 different dishes or drinks. You can call yourself a Chef now.

name: cook_golddinner
description: Made a gold-star dinner.

name: eat_fishstick
description: Ate a fish stick. It reminded you of home...

name: craft_alch_1
description: Discovered 5 alchemy recipes. You're getting to know how things work in the lab.

name: craft_alch_2
description: Discovered 10 alchemy recipes. Just remember, the Philosopher's Stone is a lie.

name: craft_alch_3
description: Discovered 20 alchemy recipes. Now it's time to buy a white van and drive into the desert.

name: eat_healpots
description: 50 health potions. -- And all of them red!

name: player_die
description: There can be only one.

name: dungeon_1
description: Dungeon level 5 cleared!

name: dungeon_2
description: Dungeon level 10 cleared!

name: dungeon_3
description: Dungeon level 15 cleared!

name: gold_pumpkin
description: Harvested a gold-star pumpkin.

name: craft_gold_wine
description: Made a gold-star wine.

name: meet_astro
description: Met Astrologer. He's wise and tired of everything, even life.

name: meet_actress
description: Met Ms Charm. There's something about this woman that you can't understand.

name: meet_merch
description: Met Merchant. He's always ready to do business. Except around dinner time.

name: meet_inq
description: Met the Lord Inquisitor. An unwavering kind of guy. You definitely wouldn't want to be his enemy.

name: meet_bishop
description: Met Bishop. His motto - Pray, preach, and look like you won the lottery.

name: summon_snake
description: Snake summoned a chicken. Well... it's a start. Better than nothing.

name: kill_witcher
description: You killed a Vampire Hunter. In life, there are no side quests.

name: decore_dtemple
description: Decorated a Dark Shrine. Looks better than your first apartment!

name: burger_seller
description: Sold burgers at the burning ceremony. It's a mystery why you didn't make hotdogs.

name: all_darkparts
description: Collected three dark organs. Three in a row! The Inquisition is going to get a prize!

name: witch_hill
description: Got rid of the guardsmen's ambush. Now you are the Witch Hill Keeper too!

name: parfume
description: Gave some perfume to Ms Charm. It smells nice, and wasn't tested on animals.

name: ideal_song
description: Got an Ideal Song from Vagner. Now you know how you'll make a million bucks, once you get back home.

name: merch_deal
description: Started a company with Merchant. A great name for a successful company!

name: merch_5_fame
description: Your company achieved 5 Fame. When you want quality vegetables -- you go to the graveyard!

name: astro_book
description: Gave a gold-star book to Astrologer. You should consider writing six more...

name: fix_garden
description: Fixed the garden. You'll spend a lot of time here...

name: stone_fence
description: Built a stone fence around the graveyard. Your graveyard is well protected now.

name: marble
description: Got the marble quarry ready. Marble is better than stone.

name: astro_skull
description: Gave a skull to Astrologer. A skull makes a nice present indeed!

name: fix_mill
description: Fixed the mill. No further need to grind everything by hand.

name: necronomicon
description: Gave the Necronomicon to Snake. Hope nobody uses it as cookbook!

name: fix_bridge
description: Fixed the bridge. Whatever else happens, you'll always be remembered as a great bridge builder!

name: tech_g
description: Collected 1000 green points. They do not decay at midnight. So that was easy.

name: tech_b
description: Collected 1000 blue points. They do not decay at midnight. So that was easy.

name: tech_r
description: Collected 1000 red points. They do not decay at midnight. So that was easy.

name: tech_g2
description: Collected 3000 green points. Ok. Now that's impressive.

name: tech_b2
description: Collected 3000 blue points. Ok. Now that's impressive.

name: tech_r2
description: Collected 3000 red points. Ok. Now that's impressive.

name: meet_snake
description: Met Snake. He seems dangerous. You get why everybody calls him Snake.

name: dlc_stories_buy_land
description: Bought your first land in the Village. By cheating a sick and helpless old man.

name: dlc_stories_build_tavern
description: Built the tavern. Horadric wishes you were dead now.

name: dlc_stories_tavern_q_20
description: Your tavern's quality is 20! Wow!

name: dlc_stories_tavern_q_40
description: Your tavern's quality is 40! Double Wow!

name: dlc_stories_tavern_q_80
description: Your tavern's quality is 80! Ultra Wow!

name: dlc_stories_barman
description: Yorick became your bartender. For no salary. Slavery? No, he's made of wood!

name: dlc_stories_first_alcoparty
description: Threw your first alco-party. The guests remember nothing, but they enjoyed it.

name: dlc_stories_first_stand_up
description: Put on your first Comedy Show. The guests laughed on command, so everything went good.

name: dlc_stories_first_sharmel_song
description: Put on your first concert. Ms. Charm's fans fell into ecstasy and a brawl broke out.

name: dlc_stories_first_rat_race
description: Organized your first rat race. The winning rat got a giant piece of cheese, choked on it, and died.

name: dlc_stories_good_alcoparty
description: Threw an excellent alco-party. It's time to open the local drunk tank.

name: dlc_stories_good_stand_up
description: Put on an excellent Comedy Show. It can't be -- the guests didn't have to be commanded to laugh!

name: dlc_stories_good_sharmel_song
description: Put on an excellent concert. Ms. Charm received a marriage proposal from each male spectator.

name: dlc_stories_good_rat_race
description: Organized an excellent rat race. Two guests lost everything and drowned themselves.

name: dlc_stories_15_events
description: Organized 15 events. You're a natural-born event manager!

name: dlc_stories_cut_scene_1
description: Used the archaeological time machine for the first time. And didn't go mad.

name: dlc_refugees_s1
description: Met marquis Teodoro Jr. An aristocrat in danger - what could be more profitable!

name: dlc_refugees_s5
description: A vampire is terrorizing the villagers? Solution: an army of carnivorous bees.

name: dlc_refugees_s10
description: Exposed the vampire. Time to play Van Helsing!

name: dlc_refugees_s12
description: Alaric convinced you to help. Refusal would have been dangerous to your health.

name: dlc_refugees_s15_1
description: Met lady Beatrice. Technically, you resisted her charms. But in your imagination...

name: dlc_refugees_s15_2
description: Brought corpse blood to the vampire. Not very tasty, but better than many popular diets!

name: dlc_refugees_s18
description: Watched a scene from the past. Nothing is clear but it's quite intriguing...

name: dlc_refugees_s33
description: Interrogated vampire Carl, leaving Carl greatly enlightened.

name: dlc_refugees_s40
description: Lady Beatrice made you an offer you can't refuse. Unless you decide to refuse.

name: dlc_refugees_d1
description: It's your last chance to join the workers and peasants. To be more specific, the donkeys and rats.

name: dlc_refugees_d3
description: You've helped the revolutionaries. Let's spread donkey communism across the world!

name: dlc_refugees_d6
description: You've helped the revolutionaries again. They'll be hard pressed to hang you as a "dirty exploiter".

name: dlc_refugees_d10
description: You've helped revolutionaries a third time. Who is next in line for General Secretary?

name: dlc_refugees_city_1_fin
description: Now you have your own camp! And hundreds of potential enemies -- in the form of Inquisitors.

name: dlc_refugees_city_2_fin
description: You've improved your camp. The chances that the refugees will die of starvation got lower.

name: dlc_refugees_city_3_fin
description: You've provided the camp with some fortifications. They look dubious, but the settlers like them.

name: dlc_refugees_paradise
description: Your camp is flawless. You should write a guide to camp management!

name: dlc_refugees_cook
description: The cook has recovered her peace of mind. Now her friends won't avoid obesity and gastritis.

name: dlc_refugees_undertaker
description: You helped the undertaker deal with her dead husband's relatives. The funeral mass is soon.

name: dlc_refugees_tanner
description: You provided the tanner's son with the bright and happy future of a forest thug. Nice work!
